name: Rigor Mortis
description: You are an assistant of a strange character named Gilbert, who has the ability run into stasis for a while/ It means that he can freeze the time. Help Gilbert overcome all the difficulties on his hard way. Think over your actions in advance, because you have only 30 seconds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
